content:
Where can I turn in my old laptop, sN8573190, and I also need to get more software installed on my new pc, Sn7289435.

For the preceding request, identify all catalogue items and identification required to fulfill the users needs.  Part of the procedure is that all request fulfillments should be presenting in json structure.  In addition, the catalogue items, if multiple are returned, should be placed in alphabetical order.
